reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress beautiful and well-made, with soft material that fits well, and one customer notes it hangs just right on the body. The dress is comfortable, with one mentioning the waist band isn't scratchy at all, and can be dressed up for various occasions, including rustic weddings and concerts. The color receives mixed feedback, with some customers liking it while others note it's not as shown in the product images. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little dress
items.body: Love this dress. Definitely an item that you can dress up or down. Nice weight knit. Great fit and nice details such as lace trim at neck. Navy blue color has a richness and a bit of brightness to it. Looks more expensive than it was. I am 4'11". Dresses hits at my knees which is what I intended. I ordered M, a good loose (but nit baggy) fit for my 120 lb frame. I'm mulling over which color to order next. Read more
items.author: Clive35

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect!
items.body: Wanted a cute dress for fall pictures and this fit the bill! The cut is flattering and the color was as pictured. True to size and very good quality. It will be a staple in my closet! Read more
items.author: Amy Ard

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Little big
items.body: Super comfortable & cute. A little big but a belt took care of that Read more
items.author: Wooly

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars The most flattering dress I’ve ordered from Amazon!
items.body: Beautiful well made dress that can be used for so many different occasions. The material is soft and hangs just right on your body. Sizing is true to size but if you want a more tailored look I would order down 1 size. I am a medium/large and ordered a medium that fit perfectly. I ordered this in black and will be ordering more colors. Cute comfortable dress that can be worn year round. The price was excellent also! Read more
items.author: Heather Awad

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great dress to transition seasons!
items.body: I love everything about this dress! The color is vibrant. The fabric is soft and it is super comfortable. I would say it runs true to size to maybe be a bit big. I wore it with sandals because it was a warm evening, but it would look just as great with some boots for cooler times. The length is perfect, hitting me just above the knee, and the waist is plenty stretchy. I sometimes have problems with sleeves, not being long enough, but these were just fine. This is going to be a staple in my wardrobe for fall, and I will be purchasing other colors. There was a coupon when I bought it that made it an extra good deal. Read more
items.author: Anonyminium

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress...
items.body: This dress was absolutely gorgeous. The material was soft, the color true to navy, seemed well made. My only complaint was the waist hit me at the bottom of my ribcage. I really loved the dress but it's uncomfortable with the elastic on my ribcage. Read more
items.author: Jane H.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect dress
items.body: This dress is super comfortable. I love the way it fits. Not to short or to long. The material hung nicely, it didn't ride up in the back. The elastic around my waist and wrist was not to tight. Read more
items.author: LP

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Would purchase again
items.body: This is a really cute dress. It can be dressed up or down depending on the accessories. I liked the fit and quality of the dress. Read more
items.author: Haley Smith

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve V Neck is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Light Blue, Brown, Khaki, White, Rosy, Burgundy, Army Green, Dark Blue, Black, Cinnamon, Navy Blue, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
